overview: Behind the low life standard of Hong Kong Asylum Seekers, Docu-Drama uncovers the events including "Suicide of Pakistani Asylum Seeker "Mr. Idris" who hung himself with a tree in a garden and took his life". How Asylum Seekers risk their lives and cross Hong Kong Border illegally. The ground realities and reasons that why Asylum Seekers mostly involve themselves into Criminal Activities and do not lead a normal life in Hong Kong.
tagline: The hidden awful life of Hong Kong Asylum Seekers and their untold shocking stories.
title: The Asylum
